user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in bras, especially considering my activities and physical condition.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a wireless bra that provided both support and comfort, especially for all-day wear. The features like the TruSupport® 4-way support system and wider straps were appealing, as they promised to alleviate discomfort and provide a natural shape. However, I did have some concerns about the strap length, which affected my overall satisfaction.

I needed a comfortable bra that I could wear for various activities, including lounging and low-impact workouts. The description highlighted the soft feel and moisture-wicking properties, which were important for my comfort. The high rating from other customers also influenced my decision, as it indicated a positive experience.

I was searching for a versatile bra that could provide light support for activities like yoga and pilates. The 4-way stretch fabric and temperature-adapting technology were key features that attracted me, as they promised comfort and flexibility. The positive reviews reinforced my choice, making me feel confident in my purchase.

After undergoing shoulder surgery, I needed a bra that would not irritate my shoulder while still providing comfort and support. The design features, such as the racerback style and soft materials, were crucial for my recovery. The high rating and positive feedback from other users also played a significant role in my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, practical, and versatile. I value items that fit well and allow for ease of movement, whether it's clothing for everyday wear or footwear that accommodates specific needs like foot problems. I appreciate quality materials that enhance comfort, such as soft cotton or breathable fabrics, and I tend to favor designs that can be worn in multiple settings, from casual outings to exercise. Additionally, I dislike products with poor construction or fit issues, particularly when it comes to sizing that doesn't cater to my body shape, as well as items that are difficult to use or have defects. Overall, I seek out reliable, well-made products that prioritize comfort and functionality.

conversation.content: I want to find bras that offer both comfort and support for my activities and physical condition. within my expected price range: [10.99, 18.99]
What specific activities do you engage in that require both comfort and support from the bras you are looking for?

I engage in various activities like lounging and low-impact workouts that require bras offering both comfort and support. It's important for me to have a bra that can provide the right level of support while still being comfortable for all-day wear.
What specific features or qualities are important to you in terms of comfort and support when selecting a bra for all-day wear during lounging and low-impact workouts?

I look for bras that offer features like softness against my skin and moisture-wicking properties to keep me comfortable throughout the day. Support is crucial for activities like lounging and low-impact workouts, so I prefer bras with a balance of comfort and gentle support to ensure I can move freely without feeling restricted. Items that have a combination of these qualities would be ideal for my needs.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Seamless Racerback Moderate-Support Sports Bra with CoolDRI Moisture-Wicking> / Item ID: B09KHQMLMD / Price: $15.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['When you need to be at your best, you can’t afford distractions from your most basic essentials. Hanes® Sport™ racerback sports bra provides comfort, performance, and style so you can focus on your workout. Crafted from a soft blended fabric that contains just a touch of spandex for stretch, this comfortable sports bra offers moderate support. The Tagless® design and seamless construction team up to minimize chafing. Classic racerback styling increases your range of motion so you are free to train with fewer restrictions. When you do work up a sweat, CoolDRI™ technology has you covered, wicking moisture away from skin and drying fast to keep you cooler and more comfortable.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes ComfortFlex Fit Women's Oh So Light Wireless Bra with Comfort Foam, Full-Coverage T-Shirt Bra (S-3XL), MHG521> / Item ID: B08L6CWW3F / Price: $16.1 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers say that Hanes® Oh So Light wireless bra is so soft and lightweight that it's almost like wearing no bra at all, other than the flexible support. This sublime comfort starts with silky ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds effortlessly to your shape. It continues with the flexible, lightly lined foam cups that gently shape and support. Additionally, this ultra-light T-shirt bra is designed with a stay-in-place comfort band that further enhances support. You'll love how this wirefree, full-coverage bra disappears under clothes, and you'll appreciate the lightweight mesh back for airy comfort. And wait, there's more! Convertible straps offer fashion flexibility and tagless styling provides itch-free comfort."]
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Women", "Clothing", "Lingerie Sleep & Lounge", "Lingerie"] category products.

I typically look for bras in the size range that provides a perfect fit and comfort during lounging and low-impact workouts. It's crucial for me to have the right size to ensure that the bra offers the support and comfort I need for my activities.
